A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great film\, and will require rewatching so I can determine how much I liked in comparison with others in the series.  My first guess would be that its on a par with ROTJ and ROTS\, not quite empire\, and nowhere near as bad as the Phantom Menace.  I do agree with many other reviewers when they say Kylo Ren is a poor mans Vader.  Hopefully is full turn to the dark side will be in Ep 9
